Text: NNG Storage Assets Cc Hi John We spoke earlier this morning about obtaining the value of storage assets owned by ETSNNG Specifically I would like to have information on the Original cost of the assets Cost as in the rate base Replacement cost Current Value Depreciation schedule method etc Cost Allocation Rate Design Age of the Asset Expected remaining life of the assets and if possible the cost and revenue by location As far as the time frame we would like to have the information by the end of the week however considering your move to Three Allen Center on Friday that may not be feasible Instead after initially looking into this maybe you can give me an estimated time frame as to when you can gather this information I will contact Bob Chandler this afternoon and see if he can assist me in obtaining NNG financial statements and any other infomation on ETSNNGs storage assets Thank you E Mike Gelin ETS Asset Development Group X
